alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:04PM CDT until June 21 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Southeastern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 804 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Texhoma, or 16 miles northeast of Stratford, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Stratford and Texhoma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
